member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.SeriLogExtensions.SetupConsoleLogging(IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.CoreWebStartup)
member.summary: Sets up Console Logging only, leverages SeriLog sinks

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.StartupExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to setup logging on NRSRx framework

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.StartupExtensions.SetupSplunk(IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.CoreWebStartup)
member.summary: Sets up the asp.net core application to log to a Splunk instance using a Splunk Http Event Collector. Refernce: https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/SplunkCloud/8.2.2106/Data/UsetheHTTPEventCollector Note: The following configuration variables are required: SPLUNK_HOST => The url of the splunk collector endpoint (ie: http(s)://{Splunk Host}/services/collector) SPLUNK_TOKEN => Security token
